title: hmcl启动器崩溃
author: codecombat
txt_content:

replies.author: mc天栋
replies.txt_content:
codecombat 发表于 2020-8-4 22:44
刚刚那个是内存调成4096的日志
您电脑要是64位请设置2048
32位请设置1024

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
Memory: 90713728 bytes (86 MB) / 285212672 bytes (272 MB) up to 14680064000 bytes (14000 MB)

内存272mb?

设置为4096mb 试试

设置大一些就对了

replies.author: codecombat
replies.txt_content:
不是，好像我当时设的内存是后边的那个。。。
调成4096仍然崩溃
